casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Clarence Vernon MOLES. No. 555P03-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Sam Currin, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of February 2006 by Defendant for "Notice of Belated Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2006."
